text_1_facilitator.eng:
â­ Children who are praised for good behaviour will want to keep behaving well and keep receiving praise. 

4ï¸âƒ£ Here are 4 simple tips for praising your child:

section_1_text.eng: ğŸ‘€ Look for anything good or helpful your child does.

section_2_text.eng:
